Class RunInfo

java.lang.Object
  edu.sdsc.inca.depot.persistent.PersistentObject
      edu.sdsc.inca.depot.persistent.RunInfo

public class RunInfo
extends PersistentObject

Represents host-specific execution information derived from a Report.
